name: Raby
description:
***Note - Raby requires at least: iPhone 5, iPad Mini Retina, iPad 4. Please close all active applications, before running Raby, to ensure best performance. ***

"Raby is a gorgeous new platformer that will keep you entertained for hours. If you appreciate a good platformer
game to keep you busy, then you will love Raby."
4.5 of 5 --- AppAdvice

"Raby is a great new platformer that will involve you into intriguing adventure full of dangers and unexpected obstacles"
4.5 of 5 --- AppsRumors

“Beautiful & IAP-free platformer”
--- iPlayApps.de

Living in a small house and happily taking care of his flowers friends,
Raby get's attacked by Mad Mushrooms, coming out of a nearby cave.
And now Raby is going on the biggest journey of his life.
The mission is to save his precious flowers and friends from
the Mad Mushroom who kidnapped them.

Key Features:
Console Quality 3D Graphics
High Resolution for Retina Display
36 Handcrafted Levels
Over Eight Hours of Gameplay
Original Characters and Story
Atmospheric Soundtrack
